1. Garth Hudson, The Band’s last founding member, dies at 87  NPR
  2. Garth Hudson, One-Man Band Within the Band, Dies at 87  The New York Times
  3. Legendary rock band’s last surviving member dies in Upstate NY at 87  syracuse.com
  4. Garth Hudson, The Band's last surviving member, dead at 87  Fox News
  5. Jeff Tweedy on Garth Hudson: ‘He Was Like a Sorcerer’  Rolling Stone
